TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit NetDataContractSerializer extends System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter
Public NotInheritable Class NetDataContractSerializer Inherits XmlObjectSerializer Implements IFormatter
type NetDataContractSerializer = class inherit XmlObjectSerializer interface IFormatter

summary.span: 將某個類型的執行個體序列化及還原序列化成使用所提供 .NET Framework 類型的 XML 資料流或文件。

span.span: Serializes and deserializes an instance of a type into XML stream or document using the supplied .NET Framework types.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 與 有一項重要的差異： 在已序列化的 XML 中包含 CLR 型別資訊，而 則否。The differs from the in one important way: the includes CLR type information in the serialized XML, whereas the does not. 因此，只有當序列化和還原序列化兩端共用相同的 CLR 型別時，才能使用 。Therefore, the can be used only if both the serializing and deserializing ends share the same CLR types. 序列化程式可以將型別序列化至已套用 或 屬性的型別。The serializer can serialize types to which either the or attribute has been applied. 它也會序列化實作 的型別。It also serializes types that implement . 如需序列化的詳細資訊，請參閱[序列化和還原序列化](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/serialization-and-deserialization.md)。For more information about serialization, see [Serialization and Deserialization](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/serialization-and-deserialization.md). ## 與 XElement 的不相容性Incompatibility with XElement 類別會用於寫入 XML。The class is used to write XML. 然而，`NetDataContractSerializer` 無法序列化該型別的執行個體。However, the `NetDataContractSerializer` cannot serialize an instance of the type. 下列程式碼，因此，會失敗，發生例外狀況: 「 根型別 'System.Xml.Linq.XElement' 不支援在最上層 NetDataContractSerializer 因為它是 IXmlSerializable 且`IsAny` = `true`和必須寫入所有其內容包括根項目。 」The following code, therefore, fails with the exception: "Root type 'System.Xml.Linq.XElement' is not supported at the top level by NetDataContractSerializer since it is IXmlSerializable with `IsAny`=`true` and must write all its contents including the root element." [!code-csharp[NetDataContractSerializer#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/netdatacontractserializer/cs/source.cs#15)] [!code-vb[NetDataContractSerializer#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/netdatacontractserializer/vb/source.vb#15)] 然而，如果 `XElement` 是用來做為類別之欄位或屬性的型別，該欄位或屬性所包含的資料就會進行序列化。However, if an `XElement` is used as the type of a field or property of a class, the data contained by the field or property is serialized. 這是因為當做為類別的成員時，該資料並不是位於類別的最上層。This is because as a member of a class, the data is not the top level of the class. ## Examples 下列範例程式碼會示範名為 `Person` 且已由 序列化的型別。The following example code shows a type named `Person` that is serialized by the . 屬性會套用至類別，而 會套用至成員 (包括私用成員)，以便指示 哪些項目需要序列化。The attribute is applied to the class, and the is applied to members (including a private member) to instruct the what to serialize. [!code-csharp[NetDataContractSerializer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/netdatacontractserializer/cs/source.cs#0)] [!code-vb[NetDataContractSerializer#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/netdatacontractserializer/vb/source.vb#0)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在正在序列化或還原序列化的類別中實作 `ignoreExtensionDataObject` 介面時，會使用 參數。The `ignoreExtensionDataObject` parameter is used when the interface is implemented in the class that is being serialized or deserialized. ## Examples 下列範例會建立使用 的 執行個體。The following example creates an instance of the using a . 這段程式碼也會設定 `ignoreExtensionDataObject`，並指定要處理的 `ISurrogateSelector` 介面的實作，以便在選取代理時 (進行還原序列化舊版型別時) 協助序列化程式。The code also sets the `ignoreExtensionDataObject`, and specifies an implementation of the `ISurrogateSelector` interface to handle to assist the serializer when selecting a surrogate (for deserializing legacy types). remarks.format: ## Remarks `AssemblyFormat` 執行個體可以有兩種樣式： 或 。An `AssemblyFormat` instance can have two styles: or . 指定 `Simple`，便可從已序列化的執行個體以及不同的版本載入及還原序列化某個版本的型別。Specifying `Simple` allows types in one version to be loaded and deserialized from an instance serialized from a different version.

summary.span: 取得或設定會控制類別載入的物件。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that controls class loading.

value.span: 搭配目前格式器使用的 。

span.span: The used with the current formatter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在序列化期間，格式器會傳輸在建立正確型別和版本之物件執行個體時的必要資訊。During serialization, a formatter transmits the information required to create an instance of an object of the correct type and version. 這項資訊通常包含物件的完整型別名稱和組件名稱。This information generally includes the full type name and assembly name of the object. 組件名稱包括名稱、版本和組件的強式名稱雜湊。The assembly name includes the name, version, and strong name hash of the assembly. 根據預設，還原序列化會使用此資訊建立相同物件的執行個體 (使用安全性原則所限制之任何組件載入的例外狀況)。By default, deserialization uses this information to create an instance of an identical object (with the exception of any assembly loading restricted by the security policy). 由於類別已經在組件之間移動，或在伺服器和用戶端上需要不同版本的類別，因此某些使用者需要控制載入哪一個類別。Some users need to control which class to load, either because the class has moved between assemblies or a different version of the class is required on the server and client.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext Context { get; set; }

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法假定預設的格式為文字 XML。This method assumes the default format is text XML. > [!IMPORTANT] > 呼叫此方法不受信任的資料時，會造成安全性風險。Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk. 呼叫這個方法只能使用受信任的資料。Call this method only with trusted data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 資料驗證](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).

span.span: to ignore the data supplied by an extension of the type; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當實作 時，日後版本型別的資料便可由 儲存。When implementing the , data from a future version of a type can be stored by the . 在往返期間 (其中物件經過還原序列化、改變，然後再序列化)，額外的資料會再次儲存並進行序列化。During a round trip (where an object is deserialized, altered, and serialized again), the extra data is stored and serialized again. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 序列化和還原序列化](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/serialization-and-deserialization.md)。For more information, see [Serialization and Deserialization](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/serialization-and-deserialization.md).

summary.span: 判斷讀取器是否置於可還原序列化的物件上。

span.span: Determines whether the reader is positioned on an object that can be deserialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這相當於使用 `ReadObject` 介面的 `IFormatter` 方法。This is equivalent to using the `ReadObject` method of the `IFormatter` interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會檢查讀取器所在之 XML 項目的名稱和命名空間，並比較值與預期的名稱和命名空間，以判斷它是否可以讀取物件。The determines whether it can read an object by examining the name and namespace of the XML element the reader is positioned at, and comparing the values to expected name and namespace. 預期的名稱和命名空間可以使用下列項目進行設定：傳入建構函式之型別的資料合約名稱和命名空間，或是傳入建構函式的 `rootName` 和 `rootNamespace` 值 (如果有的話)。The expected name and namespace can be set with the following: the data contract name and namespace of the type passed into the constructor, or the `rootName` and `rootNamespace` values passed into the constructor (if present). 您可以在下列建構函式中設定 `rootName` 和 `rootNamespace`：、 和 。You can set the `rootName` and `rootNamespace` in the following constructors: , , and .

exception.span: 設定為 。

span.span: the type being serialized does not conform to data contract rules.

span.span: For example, the attribute has not been applied to the type.

span.span: there is a problem with the instance being serialized.

span.span: the maximum number of object to serialize has been exceeded.
